text: CREDIT : Mike Coppola / Getty Images It ’ s that time of the week again when the celebrity weeklies hit the newsstands. To separate what ’ s real and rumor, we turned to our friends at Gossip Cop for the 411 on this week ’ s most controversial stories. Beyoncé and Jay - Z have already spent $ 10 million on their newborn twins, reveals Life & Style. The magazine says they ’ ve spared no expense on the babies, including buying them Burberry diaper bags, Versace - designed strollers, Chanel linens for their cribs, and even “ $ 2. 5 million bejeweled pacifiers. ” For what else they ’ ve outrageously lavished their twins with, go to Gossip Cop.
